job_history.work_description: Responsible for maintaining budget and implementing all new technologies within the firm. Integral part of technology team responsible for implementing and migrating Accounting and Billing system upgrade Managed firewall, network monitoring and server monitoring both on- and off-site.

Responsible for Maintaining Client relationships and Technical Integrity of the Infrastructure Responsible for Managing Engineers assigned to Client projects, Including time management, time approval and resource scheduling
Install, Support and maintain Novell, Windows NT 4.0, Windows 2000,Windows 2003 servers. Maintain and Patch over 800 servers in the current environment.
Managed and supported Novell 4.x and 5.x Servers, Windows NT 4.0 and Windows 2000 Servers, Citrix. MetaFrame XPa, GroupWise 5.x.
Supervise two additional employees and responsible for all issue escalations and follow up. Manage all projects and ensure on-time completion.
Responsible for all LAN/WAN Infrastructure. Evaluate, purchase, implement and maintain all Novell and Windows NT Servers.
Support 130+ Novell Servers and NDS Directory Structure. Responsible for upgrading and maintaining. servers as well as all workstation clients.
Responsible for All Software, hardware, Network, phone system and voicemail installation and support.
Install and maintain all customer systems, network installations and rollouts of all new computer systesm. Supervised 3 additional technicians.

interests: Algonquin Argonauts Football Board of Directors, Secretary
Algonquin Argonauts Football, Assistant Coach/Offensive Coordinator

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing projects, teams, and resources across various roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams and supervised employees in multiple roles, demonstrating strong leadership skills and expertise.

skills.name: Network Administration
skills.explanation: Has over two decades of experience in network administration, including installing, supporting, and maintaining various servers and systems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: System Administration
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in system administration, including installing, supporting, and maintaining various servers and systems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Server Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing servers, including installing, supporting, and maintaining over 800 servers, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Technical Integrity
skills.explanation: Has experience maintaining technical integrity of infrastructure, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing time and resources, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Resource Scheduling
skills.explanation: Has experience scheduling resources, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Client Relationship Management
skills.explanation: Has experience maintaining client relationships, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has experience maintaining budgets, indicating solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.explanation: Has education in Business Administration, indicating solid working proficiency.
